name: Camp McTex Lake
description:
An interactive autobiography.

We named it in a summer haze of laughter. A gift tucked away deep in the winding trails of our neighborhood park. Far from the shouting of playing kids and watchful chaperones. We found our sanctuary. A place we called "home".

NOTE ON PRICING: I want my games to be accessible for as many people as possible! If $5 is more than you can spend, please contact me directly by emailing me (vnguyen@mica.edu).
